name: Cereal Served
description:
Cereal Served es un juego del generó Brawler donde controlaras a cereales (en desarrollo) para conseguir la gloría contra tu contrincante en el tazón de leche.

Cereal Served is a game of the Brwler genre where you are going to controll a bunch of cereals in order to obtain the glory in the bowl of cereal.
